name: "Emerald Countess" Peacock Feather Glitter Celeb Headdress Fascinator Unusual Millinery UK
description: THIS IS THE OLD PEARLS & SWINE SHOP! THERE IS LOTS MORE ON MY NEW SITE! https://www.pearlsandswine.co.uk ************************************************************************ Ornate peacock feather headdress decorated in glitter, crystals, sequin, lace and beading. Hand molded millinery felt which is hardened to keep it's shape, this attaches to your head with a black PVC headband. This is backed with metallic green fabric. This item is made to order and this will take up to two weeks to be made. Each item is made to order so may vary slightly however I aim to keep to the original as much as possible or even to improve on the original! Pearls & Swine prides itself on quality products which are made to last. Pearls & Swine doesn't charge you for packaging as we use recycled packaging thus saving you the extra expense. All parcels are well packed and sent "Signed For" to avoid issues with lost parcels so do make sure someone is able to sign for your parcel if you are in a hurry to receive your accessories. Model: Klaudia Weselak of Venella One Model Agency, Nottingham MUA: Rachael Gunn Photographed by Kate Elizabeth: https://www.facebook.com/KatelizabethPhotographyPage PLEASE do not use the image without contacting me for permission as i promise to ensure all who work with my company are always credited. The copyright of the image belongs to the photographer.

name: "SpellBound" Half Mask Fascinator Black Velvet Lace Feather Masked Ball Accessories
description: THIS IS THE OLD PEARLS & SWINE SHOP! THERE IS LOTS MORE ON MY NEW SITE! https://www.pearlsandswine.co.uk ************************************************************************ The Half mask fascinator is a best selling signature Pearls & Swine creation, which gets so much love and attention when worn! Black velvet half mask fascinator with black lace, black crystals, black feathers and dripping in black fringe beading. Attaches with a comb, extra bobby pins will help keep firmly in place. Can be worn back off the face too This is made using hand blocked millinery felt with a black satin fabric back for your comfort when wearing it. This item is made to order and this will take up to two weeks to be made. The work is cut free hand so may vary slightly however I aim to keep to the original as much as possible or even to improve on the original! Pearls & Swine prides itself on quality products which are made to last. This is flexible but not flimsy, will keeps its shape while being comfortable to wear.
